title: Drills and drilling safety
brief_description: This video looks at the use of various types of drills, such as cordless and power drills, and also drill bits and accessories. It shows how to safely drill into metal, masonry and ceramics.
description: This video looks at the use of various types of drills, such as cordless and power drills, and also drill bits and accessories. It shows how to safely drill into metal, masonry and ceramics.
